events.text:
Did you know there are different types of quizzes in this game?
There are normal quizzes and riddles. You can tell a riddle apart
from a normal quiz by looking for the yellow particles.
Normal quizzes have random colors. So keep an eye out for both types
of quizzes and see if you can solve the riddles.
Don't worry if you can't figure them out at first, it takes practice.
